resources:
Bus Sign In <<<<<<< HEAD How to play: 

There are 16 cards face up to begin. All remaining cards are in the deck.

The player will select one card from the 16 and guess whether the next card drawn from the deck will be higher or lower than the selected card.

If the player is correct, they win a point. If the player is incorrect, they lose a point.

The game ends when there are no more cards in the deck. The player with the highest score at the end of the game wins.

The game can be played against the computer or another player on the same phone.
 ======= "Player 1's turn! "Player 2's turn!
How to play: 

There are 16 cards face up to begin. All remaining cards are in the deck.

The player will select one card from the 16 and guess whether the next card drawn from the deck will be higher or lower than the selected card.

If the player is correct, they win a point. If the player is incorrect, they lose a point.

The game ends when there are no more cards in the deck. The player with the highest score at the end of the game wins.

The game can be played against the computer or other users, with up to four people playing at once.
